tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE customer_contacts (
  customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  contact_number VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
  email_address VARCHAR(50) UNIQUE,
  campaign_source VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE customers (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name VARCHAR(50),
    last_name VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    phone_number VARCHAR(15)
);

CREATE TABLE campaigns (
    campaign_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_name VARCHAR(100),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    budget DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE interactions (
    interaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    campaign_id INT,
    interaction_date TIMESTAMP,
    notes TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES customers(customer_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (campaign_id) REFERENCES campaigns(campaign_id)
);

CREATE TABLE customers (
    customer_id INT,
    first_name VARCHAR(50),
    last_name VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    phone_number VARCHAR(15),
    PRIMARY KEY (customer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE contact_history (
    interaction_id INT,
    customer_id INT,
    campaign_id INT, 
    interaction_date TIMESTAMP, 
    interaction_details TEXT, 
    PRIMARY KEY (interaction_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES customers(customer_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (campaign_id) REFERENCES campaigns(campaign_id)
);

CREATE TABLE marketing_team (
    team_id INT,
    team_name VARCHAR(100),
    team_lead VARCHAR(50),
    team_size INT, 
    PRIMARY KEY (team_id)
);

CREATE TABLE CustomerContacts (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    last_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE,
    phone_number VARCHAR(20),
    campaign_source VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE Campaigns (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    budget DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE CampaignResponses (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT NOT NULL,
    campaign_id INT NOT NULL,
    response_date DATE,
    response TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES CustomerContacts(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (campaign_id) REFERENCES Campaigns(id)
);

CREATE TABLE CampaignInteractions (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT NOT NULL,
    campaign_id INT NOT NULL,
    interaction_date DATE,
    interaction_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES CustomerContacts(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (campaign_id) REFERENCES Campaigns(id)
);

CREATE TABLE ContactNotes (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT NOT NULL,
    note_date DATE,
    note TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES CustomerContacts(id)
);
